data.title: Milk 2% M.F
data.description:
We are driven by a simple belief: we can always make the world better. Proper nourishment allows us all to grow and thrive. All our milk flows through soft filters to concentrate protein while filtering out half of the natural sugars. Our delicious fairlife ultra-filtered milk has 50% less sugar and 50% more protein than regular chocolate milk. Plus, there are no artificial growth hormones used and it's lactose-free. So sip, drink, and chug as you enjoy our delicious ultra-filtered milk, eh?

  • Made with 100% quality Canadian milk
  • 50% less sugar and 50% more protein than regular chocolate milk
  • Delicious, satisfying, and lactose-free
  • No artificial growth hormones used

Made with 100% Canadian milk, it’s processed through a fine filtration system that naturally concentrates protein and reduces lactose. The result is a refreshing drink enriched with milk protein concentrate, offering a nourishing and satisfying experience.

data.title: Ultrapur Protein Ultra-Filtered Milk 2%
data.description:
Get more of what you want with Lactantia UltraPur Ultrafiltered Milk. Unlike regular milk, this partly skimmed high protein milk is also ideal for those who require lactose free milk. Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this 2% high-protein milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. Source of 10 essential nutrients and no sugar added, this milk is a nutritious and delicious choice for the whole family. A delightful, refreshing choice on its own, with cereal, or in blended coffee drinks. Rediscover the power of farm-fresh flavour with ultrafiltered milk. Lactantia, for Milk Connoisseurs!

  • Made with ultrafiltered milk that stays fresh longer without preservatives
  • 100% Canadian milk from Canadian dairies
  • 20g of protein per serving
  • Lactose free
  • 2% M.F.
  • Source of 10 essential nutrients
  • No added sugar
  • 1.5 L

name: SWISS CLASSIC Milk Chocolate Almond Butter Bar

data.title: SWISS CLASSIC Milk Chocolate Almond Butter Bar
data.description: Experience pure chocolate bliss with the Lindt SWISS CLASSIC Milk Chocolate Almond Butter Bar, crafted to perfection by our Lindt Maître Chocolatiers. This indulgent bar combines rich, velvety Swiss milk chocolate with a luscious almond butter filling, creating a full-sensory treat that melts in your mouth. Perfect for relaxing evenings, after-dinner moments, or simply treating yourself, the creamy chocolate and nutty almond butter delivers a luxurious flavour experience. Savour the artistry of Lindt chocolate and elevate every moment with this decadent delight.

name: SWISS CLASSIC Almond Milk Chocolate Bar

data.title: SWISS CLASSIC Almond Milk Chocolate Bar
data.description:
Indulge in decadent Lindt milk chocolate with the perfect crunchy texture with the Lindt SWISS CLASSIC Almond Milk Chocolate Bar. This elegant milk chocolate bar delivers the perfect combination of whole almonds, roasted to perfection, and immersed in creamy milk chocolate. With a glossy finish and velvety texture of perfectly tempered chocolate, every Lindt confection offers a full sensory chocolate experience. Since 1845, Lindt Maître Chocolatiers have brought passion and pride to producing gourmet Swiss chocolate. Premium chocolate begins with premium ingredients, and Lindt is one of the only large-scale chocolate makers in the world to oversee every step in its chocolate-making process. Through its innovative farming program, Lindt can trace every cacao bean used back to its farm of origin, ensuring that only the finest ingredients are used, and guaranteeing extraordinary chocolate flavour in every bite. Make sure to store all Lindt chocolate in a cool, dry place to ensure quality.

  • Package contains one 100g milk chocolate bar with whole roasted almonds
  • From superior cacao beans to exquisite chocolate, Lindt meticulously controls every step in its chocolate-making process
  • Each of Lindt’s delicious flavour combinations are crafted with only the finest quality ingredients
  • This gourmet almond chocolate bar is perfect savoured on its own or paired with your favourite beverage
  • To ensure quality, always store Lindt chocolate in a cool, dry place

data.title: Grass Fed 2% Milk
data.description: Rich in nutrients, milk has been a food staple for centuries. Used in cooking, baking or simply as a wholesome beverage, Milk is a great way to get calcium and protein into your diet. Whole milk contains at least 3.25% milk fat. When a portion of the milk’s fat is removed, it becomes partly skimmed milk, such as 2% milk and 1% milk, depending on the quantity removed. Skim milk is virtually fat-free, with only about 0.1% fat.

Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this 100% Canadian milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. data.title: Lactose Free 2% Dairy Product
data.description: Through our unique process, we can preserve the deliciously pure taste of fresh milk in every glass of our products, while removing the lactose that can cause you discomfort. So you can once again benefit from an excellent source of calcium, vitamin D and protein, plus a source of vitamin A. That’s everything you need to maintain a well-balanced diet.

data.title: Oatmeal Crisp Vanilla Protein Cereal
data.description:
Oatmeal Crisp Vanilla Protein cereal. So good it'll have you saying ""Damn"" in a good way! Made with whole grains, this cereal offers crunchy flakes and tasty granola pieces. It offers 15 g protein per serving when served with 125 mL of skim milk, plus a high source of fibre. Pair with yogurt or top with berries or nuts. Great for trail mix, too!

  • PROTEIN CEREAL: This tasty cereal delivers 15 g of protein per serving when served with 125 mL of skim milk
  • WHOLE GRAIN: Made with whole grains, dig into these delicious flakes and crunchy granola pieces
  • FIBRE AND MORE: This cereal is a high source of fibre; It's also a source of 10 essential vitamins and minerals per serving
  • BREAKFAST AND BEYOND: Delicious with milk in the morning; Take some with you for a crunchy snack; Sprinkle some on your yogurt for an extra boost of protein
  • CONTAINS: One 455 g box of Oatmeal Crisp Protein Vanilla Cereal

Always fresh, always delicious and always an excellent source of calcium, protein and vitamin D.

data.title: Ultrapur Protein Ultra-Filtered Milk 3.25%
data.description:
Get more of what you want with Lactantia UltraPur Ultrafiltered Milk. Unlike regular milk, this whole high protein milk is also ideal for those who require lactose free milk. Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this 3.25% high-protein milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. Source of 10 essential nutrients and no sugar added, this homogenized milk is a nutritious and delicious choice for the whole family. A delightful, refreshing choice on its own, with cereal, or in blended coffee drinks. Rediscover the power of farm-fresh flavour with ultrafiltered milk. Lactantia, for Milk Connoisseurs!

  • Made with ultrafiltered milk that stays fresh longer without preservatives
  • 100% Canadian milk from Canadian dairies
  • 20g of protein per serving
  • Lactose free
  • 3.25% M.F.
  • Source of 10 essential nutrients
  • No added sugar
  • 1.5 L

data.title: Fat Free Evaporated Skim Milk
data.description: Carnation   Fat Free Evaporated Milk is a shelf stable milk that is richer and creamier than milk because some of the water has been removed. With a slight carmelized flavour and all the fat removed, it's an easy and delicious ingredient to bake and cook with.

data.title: Whole Milk
data.description:
We are driven by a simple belief: we can always make the world better. Proper nourishment allows us all to grow and thrive. All our milk flows through soft filters to concentrate protein while filtering out half of the natural sugars. Our delicious fairlife ultra-filtered milk has 50% less sugar and 50% more protein than regular chocolate milk. Plus, there are no artificial growth hormones used and it's lactose-free. So sip, drink, and chug as you enjoy our delicious ultra-filtered milk, eh?

  • Made with 100% quality Canadian milk
  • 50% less sugar and 50% more protein than regular chocolate milk
  • Delicious, satisfying, and lactose-free
  • No artificial growth hormones used

data.title: Purfiltre Partially Skimmed Milk 1%
data.description:
Taste the goodness every day with Lactantia PurFiltre 1% Filtered Partially Skimmed Milk. Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this 100% Canadian milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. Source of calcium and protein, this low fat milk also contains vitamins A and D, making it a nutritious and delicious choice for the whole family. A delightful, refreshing choice on its own, with cereal, or in blended coffee drinks. Rediscover the farm-fresh flavour of fine filtered milk. Lactantia, for Milk Connoisseurs!

  • Smooth and delicious filtered milk that stays fresh longer without preservatives
  • 100% Canadian milk from Canadian dairies
  • Reduced fat, partially skimmed milk with 1% M.F.
  • Good source of calcium
  • 9 g of protein per serving
  • Vitamins A & D
  • 2 L

data.title: Organic Partly Skimmed 1% Milk
data.description: Rich in nutrients, milk has been a food staple for centuries. Used in cooking, baking or simply as a wholesome beverage, Milk is a great way to get calcium and protein into your diet. Whole milk contains at least 3.25% milk fat. When a portion of the milk’s fat is removed, it becomes partly skimmed milk, such as 2% milk and 1% milk, depending on the quantity removed. Skim milk is virtually fat-free, with only about 0.1% fat.

name: SWISS CLASSIC Gold Milk Chocolate Bar

data.title: SWISS CLASSIC Gold Milk Chocolate Bar
data.description:
Indulge in delicious Lindt milk chocolate with the Lindt SWISS CLASSIC GOLD Milk Chocolate Bar. This gourmet Swiss chocolate bar offers rich, creamy flavour with just a hint of caramel. Packaged in an elegant gold wrapper, this large chocolate bar, which offers three times more chocolate to savour compared to a regular Lindt bar, makes a perfect gift or a delicious addition to your baking. Since 1845, Lindt Maître Chocolatiers have brought passion and pride to producing gourmet Swiss chocolate. Premium chocolate begins with premium ingredients, and Lindt is one of the only large-scale chocolate makers in the world to oversee every step in its chocolate-making process. Through its innovative farming program, Lindt can trace every cacao bean used back to its farm of origin, ensuring that only the finest ingredients are used, and guaranteeing extraordinary chocolate flavour in every bite. Make sure to store all Lindt chocolate in a cool, dry place to ensure quality.

  • Package contains one 300g milk chocolate bar
  • From superior cacao beans to exquisite chocolate, Lindt meticulously controls every step in its chocolate-making process
  • Each of Lindt’s delicious flavour combinations are crafted with only the finest quality ingredients
  • This gourmet chocolate bar in an elegant gold wrapper is perfect for sharing, gift giving, and baking
  • To ensure quality, always store Lindt chocolate in a cool, dry place

name: SWISS CLASSIC Hazelnut Milk Chocolate Bar

data.title: SWISS CLASSIC Hazelnut Milk Chocolate Bar
data.description:
Indulge in decadent Lindt milk chocolate with the perfect texture with the Lindt SWISS CLASSIC Hazelnut Milk Chocolate Bar. This elegant milk chocolate bar is a perfect combination creamy milk chocolate and whole hazelnuts, roasted to nutty, crunchy perfection. With the glossy finish and smooth texture of perfectly tempered chocolate, every Lindt confection offers a unique, full sensory chocolate experience. Since 1845, Lindt Maître Chocolatiers have brought passion and pride to producing gourmet Swiss chocolate. Premium chocolate begins with premium ingredients, and Lindt is one of the only large-scale chocolate makers in the world to oversee every step in its chocolate-making process. Through its innovative farming program, Lindt can trace every cacao bean used back to its farm of origin, ensuring that only the finest ingredients are used, and guaranteeing extraordinary chocolate flavour in every bite. Store all Lindt chocolate in a cool, dry place to ensure quality.

  • Package contains one 100g milk chocolate bar with whole roasted hazelnuts
  • From superior cacao beans to exquisite chocolate, Lindt meticulously controls every step in its chocolate-making process
  • Each of Lindt’s delicious flavour combinations are crafted with only the finest quality ingredients
  • This gourmet chocolate bar is perfect savoured on its own or paired with your favourite beverage
  • To ensure quality, always store Lindt chocolate in a cool, dry place

data.title: Purfiltre Partially Skimmed Milk 1%
data.description:
Taste the goodness every day with Lactantia PurFiltre 1% Filtered Partially Skimmed Milk. Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this 100% Canadian milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. Source of calcium and protein, this low fat milk also contains vitamins A and D, making it a nutritious and delicious choice for the whole family. A delightful, refreshing choice on its own, with cereal, or in blended coffee drinks. Rediscover the farm-fresh flavour of fine filtered milk. Lactantia, for Milk Connoisseurs!

  • Smooth and delicious filtered milk that stays fresh longer without preservatives
  • 100% Canadian milk from Canadian dairies
  • Reduced fat, partially skimmed milk with 1% M.F.
  • Good source of calcium
  • 9 g of protein per serving
  • Vitamins A & D
  • 2 L

data.title: Ultrapur Ultra-Filtered Chocolate Milk 1%
data.description:
Get more of what you want with a delicious twist with Lactantia UltraPur Chocolate Milk. This partly skimmed milk contains 50% more protein than regular chocolate milk and is made with no artificial sweeteners. Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this high-protein 1% milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. Source of 10 essential nutrients, this low-fat milk is a nutritious and delicious choice for the whole family. Rediscover the power of farm-fresh flavour with ultrafiltered milk. Lactantia, for Milk Connoisseurs!

  • Made with ultrafiltered milk that stays fresh longer without preservatives
  • Delicious chocolate flavour
  • No artificial sweeteners
  • 100% Canadian milk from Canadian dairies
  • 14g of protein per serving
  • 1% M.F.
  • Source of 10 essential nutrients
  • No added sugar
  • 1.5 L

Milk2Go, the perfect on the go snack for everyone.

data.title: Ultrapur Protein Ultra-Filtered Milk 3.25%
data.description:
Get more of what you want with Lactantia UltraPur Ultrafiltered Milk. Unlike regular milk, this whole high protein milk is also ideal for those who require lactose free milk. Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this 3.25% high-protein milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. Source of 10 essential nutrients and no sugar added, this homogenized milk is a nutritious and delicious choice for the whole family. A delightful, refreshing choice on its own, with cereal, or in blended coffee drinks. Rediscover the power of farm-fresh flavour with ultrafiltered milk. Lactantia, for Milk Connoisseurs!
